generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist and serene 2D flat illustration that provides a peaceful conclusion. On a soft pastel background matching the front cover, a single, elegant red ribbon, identical to the one from the front cover's bow, is shown gently tied around a slice of pizza. The pizza slice is artistically rendered in a simple, graphic style. The composition is off-center, positioned towards the left and middle, leaving the bottom-right corner completely empty. The design is simple, clever, and complementary to the card's narrative, using the same clean lines and sophisticated color palette. The lighting is soft and gentle.
generatedPrompts.frontCover: A humorous and charming full-bleed 2D flat illustration. Two cartoon characters, a man and a woman, are depicted in a playful, exaggerated pose. The man (Jordan) is proudly presenting himself, striking a heroic pose with hands on hips and a wide, confident grin, as if he is a grand prize. He is wearing a simple party hat. The woman (Lao Lao), with a loving and amused expression, is playfully trying to put a giant, shiny red bow on his head. They are standing in front of a soft, warm pastel background with subtle, floating geometric confetti shapes in gold and white. In the center, the text "Happy Birthday" is written in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script, flowing gracefully. The art style is modern and minimalist with clean lines, a sophisticated color palette of soft pastels, gold, and a touch of vibrant red. The lighting is bright and cheerful, setting a lighthearted tone.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: An artistic and whimsical 2D flat illustration featuring a large, stylized diagram of a human brain, rendered in a clean, modern style. Different sections of the brain are color-coded in the card's pastel palette. Playful, tiny icons are humorously placed within the sections. One large area is labeled "Pizza Thoughts" and is filled with tiny pizza slice icons. A slightly smaller, but still significant, area is labeled "Thinking about You" and is filled with little heart icons. The rest of the brain has comically small sections for things like "Work," "Sleep," and "Everything Else." The background is a clean, solid color from the card's palette. The style is graphic, clever, and maintains the humorous and smart tone.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
A beautifully designed 2D flat illustration where the message is the centerpiece. The text is framed by an elegant and artistic border made of stylized, intertwined golden ribbons and cartoon pizza slices, creating a sophisticated and funny visual. The elements of the border are gracefully arranged, looping and swirling around the message area without overwhelming it. The background is a soft, solid pastel color, ensuring the text is perfectly legible. The message is written in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script with a natural pen-style appearance: "Happy Birthday, Lao Lao! I was going to get you a ridiculously expensive gift, but then I remembered my presence is priceless. You're welcome! I love you more than pizza, and that's saying a lot.

Love,
Jordan". The design is a perfect blend of elegance and humor, harmonizing with the left interior page.
